description: Try our easy to follow Classic Creamy Eggnog recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Creamy Eggnog Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Separate 6 egg yolks and combine together with, 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla bean paste and salt in a large heatproof bowl over a saucepan of gently simmering water. Whisk constantly for 5 minutes, or until mixture is pale and thick. Whisk in milk, bourbon and rum, then remove from heat.
Beat egg whites and remaining 1/2 cup sugar in the bowl of an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually pour in the warm custard mixture, whisking to combine.
In a clean bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Whisk into eggnog mixture. Refrigerate eggnog for up to 1 day.
Whisk eggnog again just before serving. Pour into glasses and sprinkle with ground nutmeg.
